title: Starry Night
description: A swirling night sky over a quiet town with stars and a bright moon.

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: Melting clocks in a barren dream-like landscape.

title: Mona Lisa
description: A portrait of a woman with an enigmatic smile.

title: The Scream
description: A figure screaming under a blood-red sky.

title: Guernica
description: A chaotic mural depicting the tragedies of war.

title: Water Lilies
description: A serene painting of water lilies floating in a pond.

title: Composition VII
description: A bold explosion of color and motion with no clear subject.

title: The Kiss
description: A golden embrace of two lovers in a decorative field.

title: American Gothic
description: A farmer and his daughter posed in front of a farmhouse.

title: The Night Watch
description: A militia company setting out led by Captain Frans Banning Cocq.

title: The Crystal Jungle
description: A mythic forest of mirrors in neon light.
